{{Infobox football biography | playername = Steeven Langil | image = [[File:Langil.jpg|170px]] | fullname = Steeven Langil | height = {{convert|1.80|m|ftin|0|abbr=on}} | dateofbirth = {{Birth date and age|1988|3|4}} | cityofbirth = [[Fort-de-France]] | countryofbirth = [[Martinique]], [[France]] | currentclub = [[CS Sedan Ardennes|Sedan]]
(on loan from [[AJ Auxerre|Auxerre]]) | clubnumber = 7 | position = [[Attacking midfielder]] | youthyears1 = 2003-2006 | youthclubs1 = [[NÃ®mes Olympique|NÃ®mes]] | years1 = 2006â2007 | clubs1 = [[NÃ®mes Olympique|NÃ®mes]] | years2 = 2007â | clubs2 = [[AJ Auxerre|Auxerre]] | years3 = 2009â2010 | clubs3 = â [[SM Caen|Caen]] (loan) | years4 = 2011 | clubs4 = â [[Valenciennes FC|Valenciennes]] (loan) | years5 = 2011â | clubs4 = â [[CS Sedan Ardennes|Sedan]] (loan) | caps1 = 11 | goals1 = 2 | caps2 = 13 | goals2 = 0 | caps3 = 35 | goals3 = 9 | caps4 = 7 | goals4 = 1 }} '''Steeven Langil''' (born 4 March 1988 in [[Fort-de-France]], [[Martinique]]) is a French football [[midfielder]] who currently plays for French club [[CS Sedan Ardennes]] on loan from [[AJ Auxerre|Auxerre]]. == Biography == Langil was born in [[Fort-de-France]] in [[Martinique]], but grew up in [[Le Morne-Rouge|Morne Rouge]]. Langil and his family later moved to the city of [[Montpellier]]. Langil began his career playing for second division club [[NÃ®mes Olympique|NÃ®mes]]. He was promoted to the first team in [[2006]] and appeared in 11 games scoring two goals. Following the season, he moved to [[Ligue 1]] club [[AJ Auxerre]].http://blogs.lyonne-republicaine.fr/article.php3?id_article=769 After a two year stint with Auxerre, he joined [[SM Caen]] on loan from the 2009â10 season. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{Lfpfr|first=Steeven|last=Langil}} *{{fr icon}} [http://www.lequipe.fr/Football/FootballFicheJoueur25952.html l'equipe] * [http://www.dailymotion.com/video/x2etxl_steeven-langil-de-nimes-a-laja Steeven Langil de NÃ®mes Ã  l'AJA Dailymotion Video] * [http://steevenlangil.skynetblogs.be/ Steeven Langil Skynetblogs.be] * [http://www.lequipe.fr/Football/FootballFicheJoueur25952.html LÂ´Equipe Profile] * [http://www.footmercato.net/Steven-Langil-20690_j.html Footmercato Profile] * [http://www.foot-national.com/2708-joueur-football-Langil-Steven-.html foot-national.com Profile] {{CS Sedan Ardennes Squad}} {{Persondata | NAME = Langil, Steeven | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = March 4, 1988 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Fort-de-France]], [[Martinique]], [[France]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Langil, Steeven}} [[Category:1988 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:French footballers]] [[Category:Martiniquais footballers]] [[Category:People of Martiniquais descent]] [[Category:NÃ®mes Olympique players]] [[Category:AJ Auxerre players]] [[Category:SM Caen players]] [[Category:Valenciennes FC players]] [[Category:CS Sedan Ardennes players]] [[Category:Ligue 1 players]] [[Category:Ligue 2 players]] {{france-footy-midfielder-1980s-stub}} [[es:Steeven Langil]] [[fr:Steeven Langil]] [[it:Steeven Langil]] [[nl:Steeven Langil]] [[pl:Steeven Langil]] [[fi:Steeven Langil]]
